title: Himi 56
lyrics:
8s & 6s
1.
Ke tau hangahanga kumi
Ki he ngaahi me’a lelei
‘Oku ‘i ‘olunga;
Pea fai fakakukafi
Ke tau ‘ilo ‘a e mo’oni
‘A hotau ‘Otua.
2.
Ke tau ongo’i ‘o ‘ilo
‘Ene ue’i totonu
Hotau laumālie,
Pea ke tau loto feinga
Ke tau ‘ilo ‘ia Sīsū
‘A hotau ‘Otua.
3.
Ke tau ‘ilo ‘ene ‘ofa
Kuo lingi hifo ia
Ki hotau loto ni,
Pea ke tau toki ‘ofa
‘I he’ene fua ‘ofa
Kia kitautolu.
4.
Pea ke tau taunima’i
‘A e fekau kotoa pē
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio,
Pea fai mā’oni’oni
‘I he ‘aho kotoa pē
Ki hotau ‘Otua. *
